name: Undiscovered: Disk of Phaistos
description:
The Great Minoan palace is the place where they found the Phaistos Disc. But maybe they've missed something. Let's found out!

Embark on an incredible journey in the cave to find the secrets of Phaistos. But it's not an ordinary cave!
On your road you will meet various puzzles that you have to solve to move forward. Be careful though. The cave is full of dangerous places and scary monsters that will harm you. Try to escape from all of them, solve all the riddles and find the secrets of Phaistos.

Features:
- Mysterious/scary environment
- Dark/suspenseful soundtrack
- Intense sound FX design
- Detailed realistic landscape
- Animated environment
- Gamepad support
